creditline: The Mrs. Aall's Porcelain Collection Fund
description: blue and white plate with blue and white cardboard plates of various patterns inside blue box
markings: label inside box lid; mark inside bottom half of box; title and mark on base of each business card; \'Est. 1746 John Mortlock the Pottery Galleries Oxford St. & Orchard St. Portman Square W.\', front center of plate; inscription in ink on front of box lid
title: Plate Business Cards
